Reviews.Title: “A good choice if you can live with the caveat (location)”

Reviews.Content: picking hotel rome tough particularly you’re travelling peak season vacation busy european bank holiday central hotels easily expensive alternative stay outside centre transport links fits latter category hand metro counted it’s 20 minute walk street hardly worth hassle bus network friend staying tips 34 buses mind departing piazza 5 minute walk hotel 360 brings colosseum brings termini 628 piazza venezia argentina piazza navona maybe vatican willing endure 15 minute walk ultimately goes giardino 5 minute walk ponte della musica cross visit modern art museum auditorium music careful regarding return leg stay late oct11 628 relied infrequent bordering nonexistent alternative youre city centre bus 87 frequent comes argentina piazza venezia brings piazza easy 10 minutes walk road hotel hence descent coming downtown evening night morning count 4550 mins door door hotel city centre youre bus mind traffic rome hectic looks relatively short distance time cover rush hours buses absolutely packed nearby restaurants piazza nice called decent prices 15 20 eur person food decent eat close hotel youre dining city centre campo dei fiori surroundings instance die hard roma fans roma sits 100 metres hotel co re di roma it’s called exiting hotel left location positives it’s close entrance via appia antica apparently info close unfortunately missed opportunity it’s simple exit left hotel walk via 200 metres exit descending via onto via appia antica comfortable sorry didn’t pictures hotel pictures relied breakfast simple tend rome hotels standard price paid 70 eur night incl breakfast 2 complaints expected consider value plan leaving hotel morning late evening night expect fine it’s time rome little frustrated location prefer central pick you’ve rome willing endure bit walking rome walkers city excellence public transportation it’s absolutely fine relish money saved lodging

Reviews.Title: “Lovely valentine's stay”
Reviews.Author: dimithri1974
Reviews.Content: lovely hotel beautiful decorated breakages easily roomy nice wardrobe mini fridge tables lamps desk mirrors bathroom shower cubicle little issue drainage water drained breakfasts nicely decorated dining coffe entrance hotel lovely garden friendly didnt speak english biggest metro stations buses difficult stops walk

Reviews.Title: “dont go there, terrible service!!!”
Reviews.Author: vz49193
Reviews.Content: wife stayed 4 nights 2 weeks ago hotel clean nice comfortable nice hotel receptionists worst theme crue bad didnt bus stations everytime theme stop answer usualy correct hotel location worth staying

Reviews.Title: “Fine and affordable hotel - not so far out if you don't mind walking”
Reviews.Author: TomElkins
Reviews.Content: hotel fine money little breakfast pretty averagebut money adequate 20mins walk metro reception 10 avid hikers takes 20 door spagna station 45mins walked coliseum day takes 40 mins bad major city stay coach parties etc prevail local trattoria meals stay dodgy walk seriously worth
